About the job
Apply Online

Interested candidates kindly apply before 13/02/2025.

CV must be in PDF format, saved with your Full name.



Job Title: Junior Full-Stack Developer

Location: Madhapur, Hyderabad

Job Type: Full-Time

salary: 3lpa



As a Junior Full-Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web and mobile applications. You will work closely with our development team to design, develop, and deploy scalable and efficient software solutions.





– Develop user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

– Utilize front-end frameworks such as React.js to create dynamic and responsive web applications.

– Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.



– Build and maintain server-side logic using Node.js and Express.js.

– Design and implement RESTful APIs.

– Integrate with databases (MongoDB) and ensure efficient data management and retrieval.



– Collaborate with front-end and back-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.

– Implement authentication and security measures to protect user data.

– Conduct testing and debugging to ensure a high-quality product.



– Develop and maintain mobile applications using React Native.

– Integrate mobile apps with back-end services and APIs.

– Ensure mobile applications are optimized for performance and user experience.



– Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers.

– Work in an Agile/Scrum environment and participate in sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.

– Document development processes, code, and technical specifications.



– Completed a comprehensive full-stack web and app development training program.

– Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and front-end frameworks such as React.js.

– Experience with back-end development using Node.js and Express.js.

– Knowledge of database management with MongoDB and Mongoose.

– Familiarity with RESTful APIs and AJAX.

– Basic understanding of mobile app development with React Native.

– Understanding of version control systems, preferably Git.

– Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

– Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.



– Experience with deploying applications using Heroku, Netlify, or similar platforms.

– Knowledge of security best practices and authentication mechanisms.

– Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.

– Passion for learning new technologies and staying up to date with industry trends.



– Competitive salary and benefits package.

– Opportunities for professional growth and development.

– Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

– Access to the latest tools and technologies.
